txt.en: 'So you spread it everywhere you saw leeches? Excellent. Hopefully soon it will be safe to explore once more.'
Dark and Shallow Water
Used newt-toxin
'We cannot explore the waters with all those leeches. Take the solution to the places where they gather and pour it into the water.'
You see some leeches crawling in the water
You no longer see any leeches in the water

Leeches swarm around goblin corpses just to the west of the Rotting Cellar.\n\nGyrgir would like you to find the corpses the leeches have been feasting upon and spread newt-toxin around them to kill the leeches.
Used newt-toxin
Gyrgir is in the Rotting Cellar in north-east Water-works.\n\nGyrgir will be pleased to hear the leeches will no longer pose a problem to the dwarves.
You see some leeches crawling in the water
You no longer see any leeches in the water
Used newt-toxin
You see some leeches crawling in the water
You no longer see any leeches in the water
Use newt-toxin
Find the first goblin-corpse
Use newt-toxin
Find the second goblin-corpse
Use newt-toxin
Find the third goblin-corpse
Use newt-toxin
Find the fourth goblin-corpse
Talk to Gyrgir at the Rotting Cellar
Used newt-toxin
You see some leeches crawling in the water
You no longer see any leeches in the water
The leeches infesting the Water-works have grown out of control and are preventing the dwarves from exploring further.

'I am not going down to the banks again. Not after what those leeches did to my legs the last time. I have a solution that I believe will get rid of them, but I will not try it.

'If you want to go down to the water and pour this in, you may feel free to do so. There are four places that are particularly bad, all near dead goblins. Those corpses are probably their primary food-source, when they cannot find my legs.

'Head just to the west. You will find the leech-infested water just beneath the Rotting Cellar.'
